to.sven.androidrccar.common.logic.handler

Interface ILogicHandlerFacade<TDependencyContainer extends IDependencyContainer<? extends IFactory,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    TDependencyContainer - The Container that contains the dependences.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLogic

    public interface ILogicHandlerFacade<TDependencyContainer extends IDependencyContainer<? extends IFactory,?>>
    Interface for the IMessageHandlers to access the Logic (AbstractLogic).
    Author:
    sven
